data.title: Six Key Updates in California’s Latest Marijuana Regulatory Proposal
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
data.excerpt: State lawmakers on Monday unveiled compromise marijuana regulation legislation that attempts to meld rules for recreational and medical growing, sales and use. The 215-page bill was drafted over weeks of negotiations by the governorâ€™s office, legislators, labor representatives, marijuana industry players, local government and law enforcement officials.
